thread.title: 'Pirates of the Caribbean 5' Trailer Finally Reveals Captain Jack Sparrow During Super Bowl 2017!
thread.title_full: 'Pirates of the Caribbean 5' Trailer Finally Reveals Captain Jack Sparrow During Super Bowl 2017!

author: Just Jared
title: 'Pirates of the Caribbean 5' Trailer Finally Reveals Captain Jack Sparrow During Super Bowl 2017!
text:
Tweet 'Pirates of the Caribbean 5' Trailer Finally Reveals Captain Jack Sparrow During Super Bowl 2017! 
Disney served up an extended trailer for Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales during the 2017 Super Bowl , and it did not disappoint. 
Along with better looks at new characters — including Javier Bardem ‘s Captain Salazar and Brenton Thwaites ‘ Henry — we get a look at our beloved lead. 
He may be covered in mud, but around the 1:08 mark, Johnny Depp ‘s Captain Jack Sparrow makes his first appearance in the latest installment. 
The movie looks to be as action-packed at eerie as the franchise’s previous four installments. 
And hopefully, we’ll get a look at Orlando Bloom in the next trailer! 
Watch the extended trailer for Pirates of the Carribean 5: Dead Man Tell No Tales Pirates of the Carribean 5: Dead Man Tell No Tales Extended Trailer for Super Bowl 2017
